DOC.brief_title: Placebo-Controlled Study ONO-2333Ms Patients With Recurrent Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed recurrent major depressive disorder Patients treatment resistance depression History alcohol abuse/dependence , substance abuse/dependence within 6 month Has clinically significant unstable medical condition Has significant risk suicide
